nodes.text: Wayne Nichols (born June 22, 1978) is an Australian comic book artist and commercial illustrator.

His recent comic projects include F.V.Z.A., Ryder on the Storm, CHURCH OF HELL and Star Wars: The Force Unleashed comic. Previously he also worked on Giant Size Hulk and Exiles for Marvel Comics. In 2008, Nichols wrapped up penciling the 4 issue mini-series Afterburn, which is to be adapted for the big screen.
He continues to contribute illustration, concept art and storyboards for media productions both in Australia and abroad.
